meanings.definition: (紋章学)盾の両脇に配置される、盾の幅の約1/4を占める円弧状の紋章
meanings.english_definition: (heraldry) A charge consisting of two arcs of circles placed on either side of the shield, each occupying about a quarter of its width.

examples.sentence: The flancards in the coat of arms added a unique visual element.
examples.translation: 紋章の盾の両脇に配置された円弧状の紋章は、独特な視覚的要素を加えた。
